heisigStory: See someone lying down in a public place with a hook in place of a hand, begging a morsel of rice or a few pence.
koohiiStory1: Lying down, Captain Hook is begging to be spared from the ticking crocodile.
koohiiStory2: Men beg lying down. Women beg as hookers.
myStory: cầu xin. cúi gập cầu xin
